description:
Human skier with the soul of a jackrabbit? Sounds about right. For speed ascents and done-in-a-day traverses, this boot operates with absolute precision. With 60 degrees of walking motion, this boot flexes with comfort, letting you take longer strides for a faster ascent. A single buckle closes the cuff and locks the boot into ski mode at the same time. Efficient transitions, unparalleled walking comfort, and wicked ski performance...this boot does it all.

  • Grilamid shell construction offers stability and rigidity without weight
  • Internal Grilamid spoiler stiffens boot while keeping the boot sleek on the outside
  • 2 micro-adjust ratchet buckles with Ultra Lock strap for secure and comfortable closure
  • Ultra Lock 4.0 closes boot and moves to ski mode in one closure
  • Speed nose design increases pivot efficiency when climbing
  • Reduced outsole length to reduce weight
  • Compatible with tech bindings
name: Dynafit TLT8 Expedition CR Boots - Women's
